titles.title: To prohibit the use of funds for the official travel of Members of Congress during any period in which a Government shutdown is in effect.
To prohibit the use of funds for the official travel of Members of Congress during any period in which a Government shutdown is in effect.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill prohibits federal funds from being used to pay for travel by a Member of Congress during any government shutdown, except for travel by a Member to the District of Columbia metropolitan area.
